#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <complex>
#include <utility>
#include <fstream>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cctype>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>
#include <climits>

using namespace std;


typedef long long LL;
typedef unsigned long long ULL;
typedef long double LD;
typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<string> VS;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)
#define REV(i,a,b) for(int i=a-1;i>=b;i--)
#define rev(i,n) REV(i,n,0)
#define GI ({ int x; scanf("%d",&x); x; })
#define ALL(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define PQ priority_queue
#define inf (int)(1e9)
#define linf (LL)(1e18)
#define eps (double)(1e-9)
#define leps (LD)(1e-18)
#define PI (double)(3.141592653589793238)


int a[100005];

int query(int n)
{
	int ans=0,s=sqrt(n);
	REP(i,1,s+1)
		if(n%i==0)
		{
			ans+=a[i];
			if(i!=n/i)
				ans+=a[n/i];
		}
	return ans;
}

int main()
{
	//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
	int n,q,k,m;
	string o;
	cin>>n>>q;
	memset(a,0,sizeof a);
	rep(i,q)
	{
		cin>>o;
		if(o=="UPDATE")
		{
			cin>>k>>m;
			a[k]+=m;
		}
		if(o=="ASK")
		{
			cin>>k;
			cout<<query(k)<<'\n';
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
